## Utils.shouldExternal() method

Whether the `pkg` should be external. Only `vendor package`<!-- -->s imported by multiple `module`<!-- -->s or `local module` should be external.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shouldExternal(pkg: PkgNode): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pkg | [PkgNode](./packer.pkgnode.md) | The <code>vendor package</code> to be test |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

ture if the `pkg` should be external
